about_the_game:
Caution


⚠️Contains NTR Stories⚠️

Background of the story


I inherited a property in the name of a distant relative who has no family and came to this old rental apartment building. When I open the room where the landlord is located deep in the top floor, I see a complete set of surveillance equipment, as well as a large number of data documents and handwritten notes. Looking through these records, I realized that my relatives had been doing spiritual research on hypnosis and brainwashing for decades, and had used the tenants as experimental subjects to observe and record the results of brainwashing and spiritual transformation. It was like a dream-like treasure trove, and the dark, dark side of the heart followed suit.

Game Features


  • Nine tenants with different characteristics, there must be something you like
  • Up to 45 single-person CGs without differential vertical painting
  • Additional multiplayer CGs waiting for players to discover
  • Some CGs are made in Live2D
  • More than 120,000 words
  • Full recall function
    • Character stand-ups
    • Character Q version stand-ups
    • Character profiles
    • Unlocked CGs
  • Simple and easy to understand Qix gameplay

Gameplay


  • Use keyboard [↑] [↓] [←] [→] to move along the edges
  • combine with the blank key to draw a line and capture territory
  • to avoid detection by tenants
  • Dodge anything that stops you
  • Pick up items to briefly enhance your abilities
  • Capture tenants by completing a certain percentage of enclosures
  • Torture the captured tenants to unlock CGs
  • Enjoy the exciting CG

Special thanks


★Music: 魔王魂

content_descriptors.notes:
This game may contain content that is not suitable for all ages, or for viewing in the workplace.
・Alcohol
・Nudity
・Bondage
・hypnosis
・Oral sex
・Sexual innuendo
・Sexual acts
・Multi-sexual intercourse
・Non-consensual intercourse
・Strong language

All characters in this story are 18 years of age or older.

Caution


⚠️Contains NTR Stories⚠️

Background of the story


I inherited a property in the name of a distant relative who has no family and came to this old rental apartment building. When I open the room where the landlord is located deep in the top floor, I see a complete set of surveillance equipment, as well as a large number of data documents and handwritten notes. Looking through these records, I realized that my relatives had been doing spiritual research on hypnosis and brainwashing for decades, and had used the tenants as experimental subjects to observe and record the results of brainwashing and spiritual transformation. It was like a dream-like treasure trove, and the dark, dark side of the heart followed suit.

name: Secret Camera

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 x86/x64
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz dual-core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD R9 280 / Nvidia GTX 960
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 x86/x64
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3400G / Intel Core i7-4930K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX 580 / Nvidia GTX 1060
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: 《Secret Camera》 is an arcade-type adult game. As an unscrupulous landlord, monitors, captures, and trains various types of tenants.Become the Dark King of this rental apartment!⚠️Contains NTR Stories⚠️
supported_languages: Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, English, Japanese
